name: Sorcerer (Gilsoft)
overview: Dark and foreboding against the early dawn, Vygors castle stands atop the mountain. A village huddles against the sheer cliff face, seeking safety in its ancient stone. But, its only release can come through me. I, Sanec, son of the great wizard Osyth, whose scrolls and orb of power were stolen by the evil sorcerer Vygor. Now I must recover these before the moon of three days hence or the forces of evil will destroy the orb, and loose the Satanic hordes upon this Earth. This was a text adventure written as a sample game of "AdventureWriter"
